title: Exchanging RP from NA to EUW
body: I recently bought an rp gift card in North America and stupid me only realized that I wouldn't be able to put RP into my EUW account until I got an error message saying I got a card in the wrong region. Is there any way possible to exchange the rp from NA to EUW? Thanks for the feedback.

replies.body: I can understand getting caught up in the heat of the moment when it comes to a game! Let's get you over to our[ billing team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if we can help you out with that RP Card.

Hello, I have the same problem. My girlfriend bought me a 10$RP card for christmas but i'm in canada/NA servers. Sadly, I cannot redeem the code, and i'm scared that my ticket won't be understood(If only you have seen what i wrote, my english is terrible...) Is there anyway I can get help with this?
